channel.title: Special attack double hit on players
channel.description:
When I use a special attack that is supposed to show multiple hits at the same time (dds, d claws, msb) it does not display both hits, but it does the damage for both hits.
Whenever I use special attacks on NPC's, it shows all of the hits.
This lead me to believe that the problem was in the attackplayer method, so after comparing it to the attacknpc method, and trying all kinds of things even copy and pasting PI's attackplayer method and I STILL have the problem.
Any help is greatly appreciated. I think I have narrowed it down to the handleHitMask method but I could be wrong.

item.title: Special attack double hit on players
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

Zymus:

Can you post your attack player method, attack npc, and the method that’s handling the special attacks?

Sure thing, please excuse the mess as I haven’t done much from blank PI.
edit: posting to pastebin because the forums wont allow me to post more than 20000 characters. one moment.

attackPlayer method: http://pastebin.com/qsdsYdGQ

attackNpc method: http://pastebin.com/12gb1CkF

activateSpecial method: http://pastebin.com/h6rXegTk

extras (incase you need them)

playerDelayedHit method: http://pastebin.com/knn3KVmH

delayedHit method: http://pastebin.com/H9pjviiW

Read full topic
